title: Daiphantus, or the passions of loue Comicall to reade, but tragicall to act: as full of wit, as experience. By An. Sc. gentleman. Wherevnto is added, The passionate mans pilgrimage.
author: Scoloker, Anthony, fl. 1604.
publisher: Printed by T. C[reede] for William Cotton: and are to be sold at his shop neare Ludgate,
notes: "The passionate mans pilgrimage", by Sir Walter Raleigh, has caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
